price: 16. “Yaanu kaa weecin xaggeeda4 mid aan Rumaysnayn oo raaca hawadiisa, markaas waad halaagsami.
arabic: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنۡهَا مَن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرۡدَىٰ
footnotes: 4.Waa inaad isugu diyaariso iimaan iyo ca- mallo wanaagsan Saacaddaa (Aakhirada).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falā yaṣuddannaka ʿanhā man lā yu'minu bihā wa-ittabaʿa hawāhu fatardā
